segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, and it’s making a huge mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is in the puddle, but she doesn’t seem to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she’s completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching too far, and that stool looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like yelling at them to be careful, but I don’t want to startle anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, but inside, it’s pure chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the woman turns around and sees what’s going on soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is one of those moments where everything could go wrong in an instant.
segments.speaker: PAR
